languages.text: "Меня беспокоят известия о Немезите. Что несет кораблю появление героя из легенд черни?"
languages.translation_comment: НА Q1 (после текстового известия о немезите и до Демагогов
НА Q1 (после текстового известия о немезите и до Демагогов

languages.text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"
languages.original_text: "Меня беспокоят известия о Немезите. Что несет кораблю появление героя из легенд черни?"

traits.locale_text: "I find these news of Nemesite disturbing. What does the emergence of this hero of the rabble's legends bode for the ship?"
"I find these news of Nemesite disturbing. What does the emergence of this hero of the rabble's legends bode for the ship?"
"I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"
"I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"
"I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"
"I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

languages.text: «Este asunto de Nemesitio me resulta alarmante. ¿Cómo afectará a la nave la aparición de semejante héroe legendario?».
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

traits.locale_text: «Este asunto de Nemesitio me resulta alarmante. ¿Cómo afectará a la nave la aparición de semejante héroe legendario?».

languages.text: 「ネメサイトとやらに関するニュースが気がかりだ。伝説の英雄の出現は、船にどんな影響を与えるのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「ネメサイトとやらに関するニュースが気がかりだ。伝説の英雄の出現は、船にどんな影響を与えるのだろうか？」

languages.text: “关于这个涅墨斯特的消息，让我心里很不安。这个传说中的英雄人物，会对这艘船产生什么样的影响？”
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

traits.locale_text: “关于这个涅墨斯特的消息，让我心里很不安。这个传说中的英雄人物，会对这艘船产生什么样的影响？”

languages.text: "Ich finde die Neuigkeiten über diesen Nemesite beunruhigend.. Welche Auswirkungen wird das Auftauchen dieses Helden aus der Legende auf das Schiff haben?"
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich finde die Neuigkeiten über diesen Nemesite beunruhigend.. Welche Auswirkungen wird das Auftauchen dieses Helden aus der Legende auf das Schiff haben?"

languages.text: « Les bruits qui circulent au sujet de ce Némésite ne laissent pas de m'inquiéter. Comment l'émergence de ce héros légendaire affectera-t-elle le vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"

traits.locale_text: « Les bruits qui circulent au sujet de ce Némésite ne laissent pas de m'inquiéter. Comment l'émergence de ce héros légendaire affectera-t-elle le vaisseau ? »

languages.text: "Nemezit hakkındaki haberler beni kaygılandırıyor. Bu efsanevi kahramanın ortaya çıkışı, gemiyi nasıl etkileyecek?"
languages.original_text: "I am disturbed by the news about this Nemesite. How will the emergence of this heroic figure from legend affect the ship?"
